name: 3D Recruits Tables
description: Remodels the workstations from the Recruits mod and Workers mod to be more 3D.
extendedDescription:
Adds 3D table models to the Workers and Recruits mods

 [Villager Workers Mod](https://modrinth.com/mod/villager-workers)

 [Villager Recruits Mod](https://modrinth.com/mod/villager-recruits)

### Workers
- Cattle Farmer's Table
- Chicken Farmer's Table
- Farmer's Table
- Fisherman's Table
- Lumberjack's Table
- Merchant's Table
- Miner's Table
- Shepherd's Table
- Swineherd's Table

### Recruits
- Recruit's Table
- Bowman's Table
- Shieldman's Table
- Crossbowman's Table
- Horseman's Table
- Nomad's Table
